sub_topic: The construction of the Heighway dragon curve.
message_1: What is the length of the Heighway dragon curve after the 10th iteration if the initial segment has a length of 1?
message_2:
The length of the Heighway dragon curve after the nth iteration can be calculated using the formula:

Length = Initial segment length * (2^n) * (sqrt(2)/2)

For the 10th iteration with an initial segment length of 1, the formula becomes:

Length = 1 * (2^10) * (sqrt(2)/2)

Length = 1 * 1024 * (sqrt(2)/2)

Length = 1024 * (1.41421356/2)

Length = 1024 * 0.70710678

So, the length of the Heighway dragon curve after the 10th iteration with an initial segment length of 1 is approximately 724.077 units.
